entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 25 March 2023
